abstract: ABC interrupted the “Bachelorette” post-game show on Monday with an unusually long promo for its new series “Take The Money & Run.” The promo generated some positive comments on Facebook and Twitter, but a lot of confusion as well.
snippet: ABC interrupted the “Bachelorette” post-game show on Monday with an unusually long promo for its new series “Take The Money & Run.” The promo generated some positive comments on Facebook and Twitter, but a lot of confusion as well.
lead_paragraph: Chris Harrison, the host of “The Bachelorette,” has a new name for “Take the Money & Run,” a reality show that will have its premiere on ABC on Tuesday: “Take My TV Show & Run!”
